title: Cloudflare outage hits major web services including X, LinkedIn and Zoom – business live
summary: Cloudflare is currently investigating problems affecting its Dashboard and associated APIs. Users may experience disruptions as the company looks into the issues. Further updates will follow as the investigation continues.

title: Australia v England: Ashes second Test, day two – live
summary: In the second day at the Gabba, the tourists were bowled out for 334 runs. Joe Root achieved an unbeaten century during their innings. Stay tuned for ongoing updates from our writers.

title: Labour announces plans to lift 550,000 children out of poverty – UK politics live
summary: Labour leader Keir Starmer has unveiled a child poverty strategy, describing it as a "moral mission." The plan includes initiatives to improve childcare access and assist families in moving out of temporary housing. Starmer emphasizes the importance of addressing child poverty as a priority for the party.

title: Weather tracker: Heavy snow blankets parts of US as winter storms hit
summary: Snowfall is shifting southeastward across Wyoming and Colorado, causing potential travel disruptions. The combination of snowfall with dense fog in certain regions is leading to reduced visibility. Weather officials advise caution for drivers in affected areas.

title: World Cup draw buildup, Premier League news and more – football live
summary: Writers are providing updates as England and Scotland prepare for their World Cup draws. The weekend promises to be eventful as teams learn their tournament paths. Fans can stay informed on the latest developments and insights.
